trans-unit.source: Represents a declaration for an instance constructor of a type.
trans-unit.target: 代表型別之執行個體建構函式的宣告。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> can be used to represent a declaration of an instance constructor for a type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> 可用來表示類型的執行個體建構函式的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeConstructor> to declare a static constructor for a type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeConstructor>宣告類型的靜態建構函式。

trans-unit.source: If the constructor calls a base class constructor, set the constructor arguments for the base class constructor in the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor.BaseConstructorArgs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果建構函式呼叫的基底類別建構函式，設定中的基底類別建構函式的建構函式引數<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor.BaseConstructorArgs%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the constructor overloads another constuctor for the type, set the constructor arguments to pass to the overloaded type constructor in the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor.ChainedConstructorArgs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果建構函式多載另一個建構函式類型，設定要傳遞給型別多載建構函式中的建構函式引數<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor.ChainedConstructorArgs%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates using a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> to declare several types of constructors.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor>宣告幾種類型的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of base constructor arguments.
trans-unit.target: 取得基底建構函式引數的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection" /> that contains the base constructor arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection" /> 包含基底建構函式引數。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> overloads a base class constructor, this collection contains any arguments to pass to a base class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor>多載基底類別建構函式，這個集合包含任何要傳遞給基底類別建構函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: To call a base class constructor with no arguments, set a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression> containing an empty string ("") to this collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫沒有引數的基底類別建構函式，設定<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression>包含空字串 ("") 與此集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of chained constructor arguments.
trans-unit.target: 取得連鎖建構函式引數的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection" /> that contains the chained constructor arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection" /> 包含連鎖建構函式引數。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> overloads another constructor of the same type, this collection contains any arguments to pass to the overloaded type constructor.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor>多載另一個建構函式的相同型別，這個集合包含任何要傳遞給型別多載建構函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: To call a constructor for the current type with no arguments, set a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression> containing an empty string ("") to this collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要針對目前的類型不使用引數呼叫建構函式，設定<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression>包含空字串 ("") 與此集合。
